privacy.metaDescription: Privacy Policy for Blipee AI-Powered Sustainability Platform

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: Welcome to Blipee ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered sustainability platform.

subsection1.title: 2.1 Information You Provide
subsection1.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
items: Sustainability data you input into the platform

subsection2.title: 2.2 Automatically Collected Information
subsection2.intro: When you use our platform, we automatically collect:

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
section3.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process your transactions and manage your account
Train and improve our AI models and predictions
Send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
Respond to your comments and questions
Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities
Detect, prevent, and address technical issues and fraud

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
section4.intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

items.label: Service Providers:
items.text: With third-party vendors who perform services on our behalf

items.label: Business Transfers:
items.text: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

items.label: Legal Requirements:
items.text: When required by law or to protect our rights

items.label: With Your Consent:
items.text: When you explicitly authorize us to share information

section4.highlight: We never sell your personal information to third parties.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information, including:
items: End-to-end encryption for data in transit
Regular security audits and penetration testing

section6.title: 6. Data Retention
section6.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When we no longer need your information, we will securely delete or anonymize it.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights and Choices
section7.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

items.label: Access:
items.text: Request access to your personal information

items.label: Deletion:
items.text: Request deletion of your personal information

items.label: Data Portability:
items.text: Request a copy of your data in a portable format

items.label: Withdraw Consent:
items.text: Withdraw consent where we rely on it

section7.footer: To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@blipee.com

section8.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section8.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect and track information about your use of our platform. You can control cookies through your browser settings and other tools.

section9.title: 9. International Data Transfers
section9.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

section10.title: 10. Children's Privacy
section10.content: Our platform is not intended for children under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16.

section11.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section11.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
